name: siliconDiffusion
description: Harness the power of CoreML and Stable Diffusion

features.Intuitive Interface: A user-friendly interface that simplifies the process of creating images with Stable Diffusion technology.
features.High-Performance Image Generation: Leverage the power of CoreML for fast and efficient image generation on Apple devices.
features.Customization Options: Personalize the image generation process with various settings and preferences.
features.Cross-Platform Compatibility: Enjoy a consistent experience on both macOS and iOS devices.
features.Gallery and Sharing: Easily save and share your generated images with a built-in gallery and sharing options.
